title: Typhon and the Winds of Destruction (5)
description: Twice the quests means twice the adventure for Zeus and his fellow Olympians.After battling fireball-throwing Titans, the young Olympians find themselves on a double Not only must they find more Olympians that Cronus has swallowed, but theyâ€™re also in search of magic seeds that will help rejuvenate the earth after the terrible drought that plagued the lands, thanks to Hyperion. But a wind-throwing giant named Typhon has other ideas. Can the Heroes in Training withstand the storms that are coming their way?
author: Joan Holub
